library_management_v2 Module

class library_management_v2.Book(id: int, title: str, author: str, description: str, rating: int, pages: int, year: int, genre: str, publisher: str, language: str, price: float, location: str)
class library_management_v2.BookCreateRequest(*, title: Annotated[str, MinLen(min_length=3)], author: Annotated[str, MinLen(min_length=3)], description: Annotated[str, MinLen(min_length=3), MaxLen(max_length=1000)], rating: Annotated[int, Gt(gt=0), Lt(lt=6)], pages: Annotated[int, Gt(gt=0)], year: Annotated[int, Gt(gt=0), Lt(lt=2025)], genre: Annotated[str, MinLen(min_length=3)], publisher: Annotated[str, MinLen(min_length=3)], language: Annotated[str, MinLen(min_length=3)], price: Annotated[float, Gt(gt=0)], location: Annotated[str, MinLen(min_length=3)])

A dictionary of computed field names and their corresponding ComputedFieldInfo objects.

model_config: ClassVar[ConfigDict] = {'schema_extra': {'example': {'author': 'Book Author', 'description': 'Book Description', 'genre': 'Book Genre', 'language': 'Book Language', 'location': "Author's Location", 'pages': 300, 'price': 19.99, 'publisher': 'Book Publisher', 'rating': 5, 'title': 'Book Title', 'year': 2000}}}

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

model_fields: ClassVar[Dict[str, FieldInfo]] = {'author': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=True, metadata=[MinLen(min_length=3)]), 'description': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=True, metadata=[MinLen(min_length=3), MaxLen(max_length=1000)]), 'genre': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=True, metadata=[MinLen(min_length=3)]), 'language': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=True, metadata=[MinLen(min_length=3)]), 'location': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=True, metadata=[MinLen(min_length=3)]), 'pages': FieldInfo(annotation=int, required=True, metadata=[Gt(gt=0)]), 'price': FieldInfo(annotation=float, required=True, metadata=[Gt(gt=0)]), 'publisher': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=True, metadata=[MinLen(min_length=3)]), 'rating': FieldInfo(annotation=int, required=True, metadata=[Gt(gt=0), Lt(lt=6)]), 'title': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=True, metadata=[MinLen(min_length=3)]), 'year': FieldInfo(annotation=int, required=True, metadata=[Gt(gt=0), Lt(lt=2025)])}

class library_management_v2.BookUpdateRequest(*, title: Annotated[str, MinLen(min_length=3)], author: Annotated[str, MinLen(min_length=3)], description: Annotated[str, MinLen(min_length=3), MaxLen(max_length=1000)], rating: Annotated[int, Gt(gt=0), Lt(lt=6)], pages: Annotated[int, Gt(gt=0)], year: Annotated[int, Gt(gt=0), Lt(lt=2025)], genre: Annotated[str, MinLen(min_length=3)], publisher: Annotated[str, MinLen(min_length=3)], language: Annotated[str, MinLen(min_length=3)], price: Annotated[float, Gt(gt=0)], location: Annotated[str, MinLen(min_length=3)], id: int)
id: int
model_computed_fields: ClassVar[Dict[str, ComputedFieldInfo]] = {}

A dictionary of computed field names and their corresponding ComputedFieldInfo objects.

model_config: ClassVar[ConfigDict] = {'schema_extra': {'example': {'author': 'Book Author', 'description': 'Book Description', 'genre': 'Book Genre', 'language': 'Book Language', 'location': "Author's Location", 'pages': 300, 'price': 19.99, 'publisher': 'Book Publisher', 'rating': 5, 'title': 'Book Title', 'year': 2000}}}

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

model_fields: ClassVar[Dict[str, FieldInfo]] = {'author': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=True, metadata=[MinLen(min_length=3)]), 'description': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=True, metadata=[MinLen(min_length=3), MaxLen(max_length=1000)]), 'genre': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=True, metadata=[MinLen(min_length=3)]), 'id': FieldInfo(annotation=int, required=True, description='The ID of the book to update'), 'language': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=True, metadata=[MinLen(min_length=3)]), 'location': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=True, metadata=[MinLen(min_length=3)]), 'pages': FieldInfo(annotation=int, required=True, metadata=[Gt(gt=0)]), 'price': FieldInfo(annotation=float, required=True, metadata=[Gt(gt=0)]), 'publisher': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=True, metadata=[MinLen(min_length=3)]), 'rating': FieldInfo(annotation=int, required=True, metadata=[Gt(gt=0), Lt(lt=6)]), 'title': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=True, metadata=[MinLen(min_length=3)]), 'year': FieldInfo(annotation=int, required=True, metadata=[Gt(gt=0), Lt(lt=2025)])}

Metadata about the fields defined on the model, mapping of field names to [FieldInfo][pydantic.fields.FieldInfo] objects.

This replaces Model.__fields__ from Pydantic V1.
